ygData.subject: Stalking Probes
ygData.msgSnippet: Now i bet 95% of the Gnomes who make this item and think this is worthless have never thought of the real reason these things where made.  A necro who is low
ygData.messageBody:
Now i bet 95% of the Gnomes who make this item and think this is worthless
have never thought of the real reason these things where made. A necro who
is low on hp and there is nothing but high level NPC's around. He makes an
eye of zomm and life taps it. Hes healed with no fear of having to fight
because its dead after 1 tap. So this item is more of a necro lifesaver then
anything else. So with that said im sure any high level necro out there
would pay a measly 40pp to save his own hide.

Stalkin Powers
Level 50 Gnome Wizard
Knights of Eternal Good
The Rathe
